definitions.usage_context_en: All people in a group. (Synonym of 'everyone').
definitions.usage_context_es: Todas las personas en un grupo. (Sinónimo de 'everyone').

definitions.usage_context_en: No person; nobody. (Used as the subject in an affirmative verb structure).
definitions.usage_context_es: Ninguna persona; nadie. (Usado como sujeto en una estructura verbal afirmativa).

definitions.usage_context_en: Used to ask if 'any person' exists. (Synonym of 'anyone').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para preguntar si 'alguna persona' existe. (Sinónimo de 'anyone').

definitions.usage_context_en: Used to mean 'no person' in negative sentences. (Synonym of 'anyone').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para significar 'ninguna persona' en oraciones negativas. (Sinónimo de 'anyone').

definitions.usage_context_en: Used in affirmative sentences to mean 'any person at all'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado en oraciones afirmativas para significar 'cualquier persona'.

definitions.meaning: El uno al otro / Mutuamente (dos personas)
definitions.usage_example_es: Mis padres se aman (el uno al otro).
definitions.usage_context_en: A reciprocal pronoun used when referring to two people or things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Pronombre recíproco usado al referirse a dos personas o cosas.

definitions.meaning: Unos a otros / Mutuamente (más de dos)
definitions.usage_example: The team members help one another.
definitions.usage_example_es: Los miembros del equipo se ayudan unos a otros.
definitions.usage_context_en: A reciprocal pronoun used when referring to more than two people or things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Pronombre recíproco usado al referirse a más de dos personas o cosas.

definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'I'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'Yo'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'you'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'tú/usted'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_example_es: Ese es su carro (el carro de él).
definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive determiner for 'he' (followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El determinante posesivo para 'él' (seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_example_es: El carro rojo es suyo (de él).
definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'he'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'él'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_example_es: El abrigo azul es suyo (de ella).
definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'she'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'ella'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'we'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'nosotros'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_example_es: El carro más grande es suyo (de ellos).
definitions.usage_context_en: The possessive pronoun for 'they'. (It is not followed by a noun).
definitions.usage_context_es: El pronombre posesivo para 'ellos/ellas'. (No va seguido de un sustantivo).

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as an interrogative pronoun to ask about a person.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre interrogativo para preguntar sobre una persona.

definitions.usage_example: The man who called me is here.
definitions.usage_example_es: El hombre que me llamó está aquí.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a relative pronoun to introduce a clause about a person.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre relativo para introducir una cláusula sobre una persona.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as an interrogative determiner to ask about possession.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante interrogativo para preguntar sobre posesión.

definitions.usage_example: The man whose car was stolen.
definitions.usage_example_es: El hombre cuyo carro fue robado.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a relative determiner to show possession.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante relativo para mostrar posesión.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as an interrogative word to ask about a limited choice.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como palabra interrogativa para preguntar sobre una elección limitada.

definitions.usage_example: The car which is red is mine.
definitions.usage_example_es: El carro que es rojo es mío.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a relative pronoun to introduce a clause about a thing.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre relativo para introducir una cláusula sobre una cosa.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as an interrogative word to ask for information (open choice).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como palabra interrogativa para pedir información (elección abierta).

definitions.usage_example: I don't know what to do.
definitions.usage_example_es: No sé qué hacer. (No sé lo que debo hacer).
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a relative pronoun to refer to 'the thing(s) that'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre relativo para referirse a 'la(s) cosa(s) que'.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner before a plural noun to mean 'the two'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante antes de un sustantivo plural para significar 'los dos'.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun to mean 'the two of them'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para significar 'los dos'.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner for a small number (countable, negative meaning).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante para un número pequeño (contable, sentido negativo).

definitions.usage_example_es: Muchos lo intentaron, pero pocos lo lograron.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun for a small number of people or things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para un número pequeño de personas o cosas.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner for a large number (countable).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante para un gran número (contable).

definitions.usage_example: Many are called, but few are chosen.
definitions.usage_example_es: Muchos son llamados, pero pocos son escogidos.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun for a large number of people or things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para un gran número de personas o cosas.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner for a medium number (more than two, but not many).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante para un número mediano (más de dos, pero no muchos).

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun for a medium number of people or things.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para un número mediano de personas o cosas.

definitions.usage_example: How much money is left? None.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun to mean 'not any' or 'no one'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para significar 'nada' o 'ninguno'.

definitions.usage_example_es: Puedes tomar cualquiera de los dos caminos.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner to mean 'one or the other' of two.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante para significar 'uno u otro' de dos.

definitions.usage_example: Which one do you want? Either is fine.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun to mean 'one or the other'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para significar 'uno u otro'.

definitions.usage_example_es: Ninguna de las dos respuestas es correcta.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a determiner to mean 'not one and not the other' of two.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como determinante para significar 'ni uno ni el otro' de dos.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a pronoun to mean 'not one and not the other'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre para significar 'ni uno ni el otro'.

definitions.usage_context_en: An unspecified person (used in affirmative sentences). Synonym: 'someone'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona no especificada (usado en oraciones afirmativas). Sinónimo: 'someone'.

definitions.usage_example: This must be someone else's jacket.
definitions.usage_example_es: Esta debe ser la chaqueta de alguien más.
definitions.usage_context_en: A different or additional person.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una persona diferente o adicional.

definitions.usage_context_en: Any other person (used in questions and negatives).
definitions.usage_context_es: Cualquier otra persona (usado en preguntas y negaciones).

definitions.usage_context_en: A different or additional thing.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una cosa diferente o adicional.

definitions.usage_context_en: Used when the subject and object of the verb are the same (They).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado cuando el sujeto y el objeto del verbo son el mismo (Ellos/Ellas).

definitions.usage_context_en: Used when the subject and object of the verb are the same (We).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado cuando el sujeto y el objeto del verbo son el mismo (Nosotros/as).

definitions.usage_example_es: La máquina se arregló a sí misma.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used when the subject and object of the verb are the same (It).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado cuando el sujeto y el objeto del verbo son el mismo (Ello/Cosa).

definitions.usage_example: I saw it with my own eyes.
definitions.usage_example_es: Lo vi con mis propios ojos.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to emphasize possession ('my').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para enfatizar posesión ('mi').
